thread.title: North Korean official calls on the US to come out with a 'serious attitude' for positively contributing to peace on the Korean peninsula

title: North Korean official calls on the US to come out with a 'serious attitude' for positively contributing to peace on the Korean peninsula
text:
North Korean official calls on the US to come out with a 'serious attitude' for positively contributing to peace on the Korean peninsula Published 28 Mins Ago Reuters Handout: South Korean Ministry of Unification Officials from South Korea and North Korea meet to discuss the North's participation in the 2018 Winter Olympics. 
A senior North Korean official on Monday called on the U.S. to come out with a "serious attitude" for positively contributing to peace and stability on the Korean peninsula. 
Ri Jong Hyok, deputy of North Korea's Supreme People's Assembly, called on the Trump administration to "understand the country's position." 
This is breaking news. Please check back for updates.
